description:
This mini-course explains key, referential integrity, and "check" constraints,
followed by extensive coverage of database triggers. It will be available for
an extended period of time. We anticipate the content will be available at
least until June 9th, 2015. You will be notified by email of any changes to
content availability beforehand.

We have created 14 mini-courses that can be assembled in a variety of ways to
learn about different aspects of databases. Please visit the main Databases
page for suggested pathways and general information, or click View Courseware
above to begin this mini-course.
title: Constraints and Triggers
